column5: We are headed to Lac Seul lake near Ear Falls on 7/25. Wondering with the forest fires that are in Canada how is the smoke in the air in this area? Thanks! Count down and is on only 10 days to go & I can't wait! üòÅ RBF
I got back home last Tuesday. Didn't notice any smoke while at camp at all. It was very strong in parts of North & South Dakota coming home through.
I just got back from south end lotw near morson on monday night , the first three days of our five day trip was hazy due to smoke ,last two days clear

We left yesterday after fishing the SE quadrant of LS for a week. We did have some high haze filtering the sun inf we had a west wind, but a whole lot less than I've been seeing in the Twin Cities. I think it helped tame the sun a little on the really bright days, but I couldn't smell it. Our winds were mainly east, south or SW and north, so any smoke we got was pretty minimal. Cool sunrises and sunsets, though!!
